title: Rebekah Lyons on the Importance of Authenticity
description:
Sadie welcomes one of her mentors, author and speaker Rebekah Lyons to the podcast. Rebekah talks about the difference between transparency and vulnerability and the value in stepping away for a season from social media. Learn more about Rebekah at rebekahlyons.com 

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
